Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in the backyard with my young (2yrs) daughter and i looked up because i live near an airport and i always look up, and noticed a very high object that was bright and kind of shined. it was a very clear day. it sat there for possibly 25 minutes, maybe longer. i needed to tend to my daughter so i couldn't watch forever. i took several photos and video. this thing was way too high to be a plane. i am located in oakland ca, near the airport and across the bay from san francisco airport. i see planes all day long and this wasn't a plane. it sat in one spot for a long time and then moved slowly to the south. again, way too high for plane and it sure wasn't a satellite. its not a balloon... too high, too large, and stayed still for a long period of time. and i have never seen a balloon that was this bright and big. from what i understand weather balloons would have something off the end\bottom. this thing was solid and round. this is the third time i have seen this object and the second time i have taken multiple photos. i took 12 photos this time.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Oakland

Summary: bright circle in clear sky moving slowly
